definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 該公司在加利福尼亞和俄勒岡州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: So, Oregon's Pinot Noir is as good as Burgundy's.
sentences.chinese: 所以俄勒岡的皮諾奴瓦和法國勃艮第的一樣好。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the new family was discharged from the St Charles Medical Centre in Bend, Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 昨天全家從俄勒岡州本德市聖查理醫療中心出院。

sentences.english: Oregon is projected to have more high-pressure days as the climate changes.
sentences.chinese: 隨着氣候的變化，俄勒岡州將會有更多的高壓天氣。

sentences.english: The electronic systems for the spectrometers will be produced in Oregon by Avicenna Instruments, the researchers said.
sentences.chinese: 該光譜儀的電子系統將由在美國的俄勒岡州生產。
我們打算搬回俄勒岡州去。

sentences.english: How Have Land-use Regulations Affected Property values in Oregon?
sentences.chinese: 俄勒岡土地利用條例怎樣影響不動產價值？

sentences.english: The stylistic vision of this wine is an "Oregon version" of Alsatian Pinot Gris.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒用俄勒岡產阿爾薩斯白皮諾釀造。

sentences.english: And the last one was just about 2 months ago up in Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 上一次也就是兩個月前在俄勒岡斷的。

sentences.english: It's the only oceanfront hotel in the Florence area for miles.
sentences.chinese: 佛羅倫薩，俄勒岡州的只有數英里的海濱酒店。

sentences.english: Obama took his campaign to Beaverton, Oregon, on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬星期五在俄勒岡的比弗頓展開競選活動。

sentences.english: A lake of southwest Oregon in a volcanic crater of the Cascade Range.
sentences.chinese: 美國俄勒岡州西南部喀斯特山脈一個火山凹湖。

sentences.english: Dan currently resides in Portland, Oregon.
sentences.chinese: Dan現在生活在俄勒岡州的波特蘭市。

sentences.english: Crater Lake National Park is the only National Park in Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 火山湖國家公園是唯一的國家公園在俄勒岡州。

sentences.english: How many Oregonians does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個燈泡旋上，需要幾個俄勒岡人？

sentences.english: The Portland Oregonian also reported that Turkoglu broke off talks.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭當地的《俄勒岡報》也報道了這一消息。
